title: Advanced Shooter SFX - Weapons Part One
description: Get your hands on the trigger and take hold of this great collection of Advanced SFX for your shooter game: 82 different weapons coming as well as Vehicles, Props, Physics, Explosions and ANYTHING ELSE, everything you need to spice up your shooter
longDescription:
🔊 Listen to the Preview Here

📄 CHECK THE ACTION RPG SERIES


THIS. IS. HUGE! This collection includes everything you need and don't need to create a realistic shooter. More than 18,000 high-quality sounds, specially tailored for AAA projects.


The collection is divided into Global sections, as well as parts.


The first section of Advanced Shooter introduces the most important element - Weapons, that contains 1424 high-polished SFX.


📄Includes 7 weapons, 6 types of sounds and hundred of different types sounds, like Distance, Mechanical, Loop and etc. Each weapon has over 180 sounds for different situations and needs.📄


📄 Weapons:📄

  • AK74 - Distance, Foley, Indoor, Loop, Outdoor, Suppressor, Core, Mechanical.
  • AKM - Distance, Foley, Indoor, Loop, Outdoor, Suppressor, Core, Mechanical.
  • M16 - Distance, Foley, Indoor, Loop, Outdoor, Core, Mechanical.
  • Makarov - Distance, Foley, Indoor, Loop, Outdoor, Suppressor, Core, Mechanical, Reflection
  • MK14 - Distance, Foley, Indoor, Loop, Outdoor, Suppressor, Core, Mechanical, Reflection.
  • Pistol - Distance, Foley, Indoor, Loop, Outdoor, Suppressor, Core, Mechanical, Reflection
  • Hydra 70 - one of the weapon from future parts, launch sounds.


Rock & Loaded, Sir! One of the best part of this collection not only in basic sounds, but also environments, physics, props, foley, voice lines, a lot of vehicle types, different surfaces and much, much more! Expect the release of new parts, as well as the most important thing - Advanced Shooter SFX All-In-One!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 1424

Number of Audio Cues: 1424

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz/ 1536 kbps

Do Sound FX loop: No, but some of them are intended

Minutes of audio provided: 42 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/ishodus-studio/advanced-shooter-sfx-weapons-part-one?si=3ac86e31f17b43bf8363a82a3b4bb7c1&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing

Important/Additional Notes: Thank for your interest in this!
